bibl.title: Postcard from Gilman, Son & Co. to Charlotte C. Sweitzer, March 11, 1903

div1.p: The company will send Sweitzer a check for her transfer of claim.

div1.head: Postcard from Gilman, Son & Co. to Charlotte C. Sweitzer, March 11, 1903
div1.p:
We have received your transfer of claim
duly executed, and we expect to send you the check
and certificate as called for as soon as the requi-
site number of transfers of claims is received,
which we think will be in a few days.
div1.closer:
Very Respectfully yours GILMAN, SON & CO. AC
RT
